oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hilbert series of fiber cones of ideals with almost minimal mixed multiplicity
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: D'CRUZ, C
VERMA, JK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: rees-algebras
hilbert series
cohen-macaulay rings
almost minimal mixed multiplicity
mixed multiplicities
fiber cones
reduction of an ideal
joint reduction
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Let (R m) be a Cohen-Macaulay local ring and let I lie an m-primary ideal. We introduce ideals of almost minimal mixed multiplicity which are analogues of ideals studied by J. Sally [Compositio. Math. 40 (1980), 167-175]. The main theorem describes the Hilbert series (if fiber cones of these ideals.
